channel.title: Commands PI
channel.description: can someone give me the "resetatk" and "resetstr" and "resetpray" commands? i'll gladly rep++

item.title: Commands PI
item.dc:creator: @go_armand go armand
item.description:
@go_armand wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("resetdef")) { if (c.inWild()) return; for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) { if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) { c.sendMessage("Please take all your armour and weapons off before using this command."); return; } } try { int skill = 1; int level = 1; c.playerXP[skill] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(level)+5; c.playerLevel[skill] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(skill); } catch (Exception e){} }

Thats resetdef. I know you didnt ask for it, but just change it to suit attack pray and str.
It’s also a better code then the ones ^.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands PI
item.dc:creator: @helloimwhite helloimwhite
item.description:
@helloimwhite wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("resetattack")) { if(c.playerXP[0] > 14000000) { c.sendMessage("Sorry, You can't have anymore then 20k Attack exp to reset it"); return;} c.playerXP[0]=0; c.getPA().refreshSkill(0); for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) { if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) { c.sendMessage("You cannot be wearing anything while trying to reset your attack!"); return; } } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("resetdefence")) { if(c.playerXP[1] > 14000000) { c.sendMessage("Sorry, You can't have anymore then 20k Defence exp to reset it"); return;} c.playerXP[1]=0; c.getPA().refreshSkill(1); for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) { if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) { c.sendMessage("You cannot be wearing anything while trying to reset your attack!"); return; } }

Read full topic

item.title: Commands PI
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Brandontan:

well usually when you reset something the skill goes to one.

Not if you have a PVP server where the skills are default to 99, and you have specials that decrease the level.

if (command.equals("resetstr")) {
    playerXP[strId] = 0;
    playerLevel[strId] = 1;
    // send skill update
}

Same goes for the attack and prayer; just replace the strId with the skill id you want. Or for a more useful command

if (args[0].equals("set")) {
    if (args[1].equals("skill")) {
        if (args[2].equals("level")) {
            final int skill = Integer.parseInt(args[3]);
            final int level = Integer.parseInt(args[4]);
            playerLevel[skill] = level;
        }
        else if (args[2].equals("exp") {
            final int skill = Integer.parseInt(args[3]);
            final int exp= Integer.parseInt(args[4]);
            playerLevel[skill] = exp;
        }
    }
}

Read full topic
